chunks.lyrics: Here is my transcription of "After the Rain" by Bruce Cockburn
Feel free to clean up any mistakes and mail it back to me :)
Line feeds inserted so that it will hopefully print nicely at 66 lines
Starts off kind of free flowing, and then moves into the 4/4 time with
repeating bass note that is Bruce's signiture. I strongly suggest learning
this while listening to the recording cited above. While I've tried to make
this transcription note-for-note, I very much doubt that it is perfect. In
particular, bars 21 to 24 don't quite sound right. I believe the hammer-on
is only done once in bars 22 and 23, but I couldn't quite hear exactly what
he was doing (I think it's just a combination of hammer-on/muted strings but
I can't seem to play this, hence I couldn't very well transcribe it).
Chords: I know quite a few, but I have no idea what they are called. :)
So, instead of putting the names of chords above the Tablature I decided
just to list the major chords in TAB format with the fingerings that work
best for me. It should be relatively easy to match the chords up with the
Tablature, but in case you can't let me know and I'll do something about it.
. Above a note indicates a staccatto note
. Above 'e' line indicates chord quickly muted after played
Repeat bars 17 to 22 once (lyrics start again), then:
Repeat bars 17 to 24 twice (main lyrics begin again).
Repeat bars 9 to 16 once, then the closing part with lead:
